steps.name: I add "Gwyn Endurance Tee Medium Green" to the cart with quanitiy "4"
I select "United Kingdom" as the shipping address
I update the quantity of "Gwyn Endurance Tee Medium Green" to "3"
I add to quantity "1" "Gwyn Endurance Tee Small Yellow" to chart
I add again "Quest Lumaflex™ Band" to the cart with quantity "1"
the latest cart total should be "$116.00"

name: Add products to cart and check cart total
description:
As a customer
  I want to add items to my cart
  So that I can purchase them
